name: Slash or Die 2
description: In this game you will face violence and extraordinary complexity. You will have to become one of three heroes to slash enemies or to die from their hands. What will your hero do?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP1-3,Vista,7,8 and 10 Processor: 1.2 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Must support of Direct3D 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
